p: New and innovative approaches to conducting V&As have also come from individual countries. The UK Climate Change Risk Assessment developed a new way to conduct risk framing and prioritize adaptation options to generate more decision-relevant information. This approach was applied to nearly sixty individual risk areas including human health [ 41]. It used the concept of urgency to summarize the findings of the assessment analysis and to communicate the need for further adaptation actions based upon the four categories: “more action needed”, “research priority”, “sustain current action”, or “watching brief” [ 41].
